???.ToolTip: Experimental weapon. Does not need ammo or save.

Abantium.ToolTip: Space material that is very malleable and light.

Actuator.ToolTip: Slides an attached part with the same rotation when powered and signaled.

Amethyst.ToolTip: Rare gem found only in crystal outcroppings.

Ammo.ToolTip: Touch to a Container to insert ammo.

Asphalt.ToolTip: High-friction road material, weak in buildings/vehicles.

BallastTank.ToolTip: Controls submarine depth, and prevents sea corrosion.

BallTemplate.ToolTip: Attach to a raw material to form a sphere.

Bank.ToolTip: Stores Credits, useful for future servers.

BarbedWire.ToolTip: Damages players on contact while active. Click to unpack

BaseCenter.ToolTip: Hurls spike balls at enemies on foot. Team spawnpoint in teamed events.

BeamCannon.ToolTip: Fires energy rays when activated. Requires power and inserted material.

Bend.ToolTip: Changes Track direction or acts as a rail switch.

BladeTemplate.ToolTip: Attach to a raw material to form a melee-attack Blade.

Bogie.ToolTip: Train base that follows Track. Powered by an attached motor/engine.

Button.ToolTip: Signals attached parts when clicked. Can be used for keybinds in seats.

BurstWire.ToolTip: Pushes away connected parts and emits a delayed signal.

Camera.ToolTip: Sends video feed to a Television.

Cannon.ToolTip: Projectile weapon. Requires inserted material and ammo supply.

CarbonFiber.ToolTip: Strong and lightweight, but expensive and low malleability.

Ceramic.ToolTip: Resistant to attack, but can shatter from large impacts.

ChemicalPlant.ToolTip: Uses energy to convert certain substances into others.

Cleats.ToolTip: Very strong, high-friction material for mech feet.

CloakingDevice.ToolTip: Renders attached vehicles invisible when powered.

Clock.ToolTip: Displays game year and time of day.

Coal.ToolTip: Solid fossil fuel. Burns very slowly.

ComboLock.ToolTip: Signals when correct code entered. Prevents hacking of attached doors.

Commlink.ToolTip: Turns nearby chats into a signal, range depends on size.

Computer.ToolTip: Runs programs or websites, requires power.

Conduit.ToolTip: Recieves energy from Substations through the ground.

ConfigBox.ToolTip: Configures attached part settings when signaled.

Container.ToolTip: Storage for liquids, gases, Ammo, or Coal.

Controller.ToolTip: Controls engine/motor/rocket speed, or height of Balloon/BallastTank.

Cooler.ToolTip: Reduces temperature while powered. Use with Container for LiquidNitrogen.

CornerTemplate.ToolTip: Attach to a raw material to form a CornerWedge.

CrudeWing.ToolTip: Primitive way to provide lift when moving forward.

Curium.ToolTip: Intensely radioactive and pyrophoric material which emits signals through walls.

Debouncer.ToolTip: Signal wire with an adjustable cooldown.

Derrick.ToolTip: Drills for resources when powered and clicked.

Detector.ToolTip: Emits a signal when certain actions occur within range.

DeuteriumCap.ToolTip: Acid neutralizer and hydrogen bomb component.

DimensionalDoor.ToolTip: Entry to a large room in another dimension.

Dish.ToolTip: Analyzes an area, saps power, or jams wireless devices.

DoorTemplate.ToolTip: Attach to a raw material to form a Door which is signaled to open/close.

Dynamite.ToolTip: Weak explosive that gets stronger when more are put together.

EMPBomb.ToolTip: Temporarily disables power systems, even through walls.

Endgame.ToolTip: Starts a new map. Activated by 12 player votes.

EnergyBomb.ToolTip: Powerful explosive that permanently fries parts.

EnergyCannon.ToolTip: Energy weapon with diverse effects. Requires power and inserted materials.

EnergyShield.ToolTip: Creates a large shield that absorbs damage while powered.

Engine.ToolTip: Creates torque from a Gas or Oil supply.

Eridanium.ToolTip: Very strong and malleable, but extremely heavy space metal.

Factory.ToolTip: Supplies inserted raw materials to players within 600 studs.

Faucet.ToolTip: Releases liquids/gases from Pipes, Valves, or Containers when active.

Filler.ToolTip: Automatically transfers substances to nearby Containers.

Firebox.ToolTip: Burns flammable materials safely. Provides heat.

Firework.ToolTip: Launches into sky and bursts when signaled/burned.

Flint.ToolTip: Sporadically sparks fire when rubbed against a flammable part.

Foam.ToolTip: Breaks into chunks from hard impacts.

Foundation.ToolTip: Aligns itself as a flat, anchored platform.

GammaDrive.ToolTip: Fast but inefficient spaceship engine with lower lifting force.

Gear.ToolTip: Meshes with other Gears to transfer torque.

Gel.ToolTip: Malleable substance that acts as a fire suppressant.

Generator.ToolTip: Generates energy from attached fossil fuel motors.

Gold.ToolTip: Very heavy, malleable, and expensive metal.

Goo.ToolTip: Sticks to parts if at least two others connected.

GravDevice.ToolTip: Generates an artificial gravity field in space.

Gun.ToolTip: Tracefire weapon. Requires inserted material and ammo supply.

Gunpowder.ToolTip: Weak explosive that detonates when exposed to heat or fire.

Heater.ToolTip: Increases temperature while powered. Use with Container to boil water.

Herbicide.ToolTip: Disperses and kills off artificial plant life when signaled.

Hybrid.ToolTip: Combination of two items from a Lab. Does not save.

HyperDrive.ToolTip: Warps to a specified planet when power is applied.

InertiaTrigger.ToolTip: Signals attached parts when there is a change in speed.

Instrument.ToolTip: Displays and can signal various types of data.

InsulatedWire.ToolTip: Transfers energy to parts owned by the same player.

Interceptor.ToolTip: Fast missile which locks onto moving Warheads.

Inverter.ToolTip: Connects multiple energy cells to a single circuit. Can transmit energy through ground.

ICBM.ToolTip: Launches a payload towards the target.

Jade.ToolTip: Valuable crystal that cannot be supplied by a Factory.

JetPack.ToolTip: Allows flight and other advantages. Fueled with Gas.

Keyboard.ToolTip: Provides input to Computers or signals to other parts.

Keypad.ToolTip: Outputs number signals when clicked or used with a seat.

Lab.ToolTip: Creates experimental weapons or enriches uranium. Can also combine parts if in space.

LaserTargeter.ToolTip: Signals mouse click position when attached to any seat.

Launcher.ToolTip: Advanced ballistic weapon. Requires inserted material and ammo supply.

Leaves.ToolTip: Foilage from a tree or bush.

Levitator.ToolTip: Hovers while powered. Can move over water or climb walls.

Lexan.ToolTip: Strong and transparent but flammable polycarbonate.

Lift.ToolTip: Elevator that can climb a nearby wall when powered.

LightningRod.ToolTip: Attracts and safely harvests lightning strikes.

Mainspring.ToolTip: Clockwork torque spring, wound by touching with character.

Market.ToolTip: Used to buy and sell Trinkets.

MechLimb.ToolTip: Actuates to position signals when unpacked and powered.

MemoryChip.ToolTip: Stores signal data, Computer programs, or websites.

Monitor.ToolTip: Displays incoming signal data or Computer video.

Neodymium.ToolTip: Valuable metal that cannot be supplied by a Factory.

Ore.ToolTip: Insert into a Refinery to yield the pure material.

OxygenCandle.ToolTip: Generates breathable air when signaled or set on fire.

ParachutePack.ToolTip: Slows falling. Deploys on signal (or automatically when worn).

PayBox.ToolTip: When clicked, transfers credits to a Bank and emits a signal.

PhotonShard.ToolTip: Comet fragment that regenerates health of nearby players.

Pod.ToolTip: Unexplained treasure chest that can only be opened on Earth. Detonates if warped/teleported.

PolyesterCoat.ToolTip: Adjusts temperature to a more comfortable level if worn.

Polysilicon.ToolTip: Commands various part functions when signaled.

PowerCell.ToolTip: Chargeable power source with a capacity depending on size.

PowerPlant.ToolTip: Large engine powered by any fossil fuel.

ProbabilityField.ToolTip: Resists damage purely by hit rate, ignoring actual weapon power.

Propeller.ToolTip: Applies a forward force while spinning. Only usable with engines/motors.

Prospector.ToolTip: Scans for underground resources when signaled.

Protalium.ToolTip: Valuable, glowing power crystal that cannot be supplied by a Factory.

ProtonCell.ToolTip: Provides energy from inserted Protalium rods.

PsiButton.ToolTip: Signals attached parts when clicked. Unlimited click distance.

PulseDrive.ToolTip: Spaceship engine with slow acceleration and variable speed.

PulseJet.ToolTip: Jet engine which functions best at moderate altitudes.

Radar.ToolTip: Displays world map and nearby objects.

RadiationSuit.ToolTip: Provides some radiation resistance if worn.

Ramjet.ToolTip: Fast jet engine that only functions when already in motion.

Refinery.ToolTip: Purifies ores. Can create biofuel from Leaves if powered.

RemoteSeat.ToolTip: Remotely controlled by a SteeringSeat. Not a true seat.

Rocket.ToolTip: Primitive spaceship engine that burns Oil.

Rotor.ToolTip: Hovers at a height depending on rotational speed. Tilt to move laterally.

Ruby.ToolTip: Transparent gem occasionally found while rock mining.

Sail.ToolTip: Turns wind speed into forward force while active.

Sand.ToolTip: Powder that is burned to create Glass.

Scanner.ToolTip: Identifies passengers and abilities of distant vehicles. Requires power.

SeaAlloy.ToolTip: Aluminium alloy suitable for use in submarines.

SearchLight.ToolTip: Shines on incoming vehicles at a different elevation while powered.

SeaPropeller.ToolTip: Pushes backward when spun with an engine/motor underwater.

Seeker.ToolTip: Points to a target based on attached MemoryChip info while powered.

SelfDestruct.ToolTip: Obliterates a vehicle of the same owner.

Sensor.ToolTip: Scans or signals objects with a ray.

Sentry.ToolTip: Involved in the defenses of Rogue-claimed planets.

Servo.ToolTip: Electric motor which turns to an angle determined by signals.

SignalSwitch.ToolTip: Allows signals through only when active.

SpaceSuit.ToolTip: Enables breathing in space or underwater if worn.

SpawnPoint.ToolTip: Allows owner to spawn at its location.

SteamEngine.ToolTip: Creates torque from a Steam supply. Very heavy.

SteeringSeat.ToolTip: Enables vehicle steering by a player.

StirlingEngine.ToolTip: Generates torque from attached heat sources.

Stone.ToolTip: Building material with low malleability and medium strength.

Sulfur.ToolTip: Substance that burns with a blue flame.

Substation.ToolTip: Distributes energy to Conduits through the ground.

Switch.ToolTip: Allows energy through only when active.

Teleporter.ToolTip: Warps players to another Teleporter while powered.

Television.ToolTip: Displays a video feed from a Camera if powered and clicked on.

Thruster.ToolTip: Applies a direct force while powered.

TimeMachine.ToolTip: Views/recovers items from the past, and sends items to the future.

TintedGlass.ToolTip: Transparent material that is opaque on one side.

Titanium.ToolTip: Low malleability, but very strong metal.

TouchTrigger.ToolTip: Signals attached parts when touched by an object or player.

Track.ToolTip: Rails for train Bogies to move upon. Use Bends for turns.

Transmission.ToolTip: Increases Bogie speed at the cost of torque.

Treads.ToolTip: Continuous tracks with high torque, powered by driveshaft links.

Trinket.ToolTip: Unusual item obtained from the Market.

Truss.ToolTip: Iron girder that can be climbed.

Turbofan.ToolTip: Jet engine powered by Gas or Oil.

Turboshaft.ToolTip: Hinge-turning jet powered by Gas or Oil.

Uranium.ToolTip: Radioactive metal that cannot be supplied by a Factory.

Valve.ToolTip: Allows Container substances to flow through only when active.

Warhead.ToolTip: Atomic bomb with an arming code interlock.

WarpGate.ToolTip: Transport players and unwelded parts to the opposite server.

WedgeTemplate.ToolTip: Attach to a raw material to form a wedge.

WheelTemplate.ToolTip: Attach to a raw material to form a Wheel. Rubber has best grip.

Y.ToolTip: Strong, light, and malleable. Ignored by contact-detecting parts.

Zaktralia.ToolTip: Rare holocrystal used for postmodern technology.

ZapWire.ToolTip: Shocks players and burns flammable parts while powered.
